name: build-failure-notifier
description: Build Failure Notifier: - Install node.js - Install Visual Studio Code - Create main.js file containing server program - Install Jenkins Plugin to get send build notifications https://wiki.jenkins-ci.org/display/JENKINS/Notification+Plugin - Connect Raspberry Pi... - Install win-sshfs to be able to access Raspberry system files from windows https://code.google.com/p/win-sshfs/downloads/detail?name=win-sshfs-0.0.1.5-setup.exe&can=2&q= - Install Putty -
